\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\& \bullet \& \bullet \\
	\color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,71}{\bullet} \& \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,71}{\bullet} \& \bullet \\
	\color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,71}{\bullet} \& \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,71}{\bullet} \& \bullet
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,71}, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,71}, equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["d", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,71}, two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["i", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,71}, tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
